summary: This bill, the Apex Project, Nevada Land Transfer and Authorization Act Amendments Act, amends the original act from 1989. It primarily focuses on land transfer and authorization related to the Apex Industrial Park in Nevada. Key changes include adding the City of North Las Vegas and the Apex Industrial Park Owners Association to the involved parties, modifying definitions, and expanding transfer authorizations. It also addresses environmental considerations and mineral material sales related to the Apex Site.
